overview: The “At Home with…” team spends some time with football referee Nick Mullins, a man who has dreamt of being a referee since he was a child.  We follow Nick as he copes with life in lockdown during the peak of the Covid-19 pandemic, which has kept him away from his beloved job.  Nick opens up and gives us an insight into his life, his passions and his dreams for the future.
title: At Home With ... Nick Mullins
